item.title: Nginx Reverse Proxy for Apps
item.description: Have you ever found yourself in the following situation: You have a application that is running locally on your computer (e.g. Raspberry Pi) and you want to access it from your other devices. When you make a request on http://localhost:PORT/SOME_ENDPOINT from the computer on which the application runs, it is successful, but when you use other device, the website can not be found. If yes, than this is an article for you!
